v.v: Yahweh gave Micah, who was from Moresheth in Judah, these messages in visions about Samaria and Jerusalem during the time when Jotham, and then Ahaz, and then Hezekiah were the kings of Judah.
You people everywhere on the earth, pay attention to this.
He will come down from heaven
It will be as though the mountains will melt under his feet
Those things will happen because of the terrible sins that the people of Israel, the descendants of Jacob, have committed.
Yahweh says this: “I will cause Samaria to become a heap of rubble;
I will make others smash the idols in Samaria to pieces.
Because Samaria will be destroyed, I will weep and wail.
I will lament because Samaria will be completely destroyed;
Do not tell that to our enemies in the city of Gath in Philistia!
You people who live in Shaphir,
You people in the city of Lachish,
You people of Judah, send a farewell gift to the people of Moresheth,
You people of Judah, shave your heads and go into mourning,
Terrible things will happen to you who lie awake at night,
You want fields that belong to other people,
